name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Dynamic Full-Stack Software Engineer with expertise in **Next.js**, **React**, **TypeScript**, **GraphQL**, and **Node.js**, focusing on developing user-centric applications and implementing microservices architecture. Adept at leveraging **D3.js**, **Cytoscape.js**, and **Recharts** for data visualization and analytics, alongside cloud technologies such as **AWS** and **Docker** for efficient deployment. Skilled in building and optimizing **AI-driven dashboards**, as well as utilizing **Terraform** for infrastructure as code and CI/CD pipelines for streamlined workflows. Proven track record in enhancing application performance across healthcare, eCommerce, and finance sectors, with a strong commitment to clean code and collaborative teamwork.

experience.responsibilities:
Developed interactive user interfaces leveraging **Next.js**, **React**, and **TypeScript**, ensuring a responsive design and enhancing user engagement by 50%.
Implemented RESTful APIs for seamless integration with backend services, reducing data retrieval time by 25%.
Created dynamic data visualizations using **D3.js**, **Recharts**, and **Graphology** to display complex datasets clearly, improving stakeholder insights by 40%.
Architected microservices with **Node.js**, ensuring modular design and scalability, which led to a 30% increase in system reliability.
Established CI/CD processes using **Docker** and **Terraform**, streamlining application deployment and maintaining a 95% success rate on deployments.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to develop AI-driven dashboards, enhancing analytics capabilities and reducing report generation time by 60%.
Engineered knowledge and data graphs for effective data management, supporting advanced data querying features and facilitating better decision-making.
Participated in communication and teamwork initiatives that improved project coordination and reduced project timelines by 20%.

Developed engaging user interfaces and dashboard systems utilizing **Next.js**, **React**, and **TypeScript**, leading to a **20%** improvement in user engagement.
Collaborated with backend teams to implement **GraphQL** and **REST** APIs, enhancing data retrieval efficiency and performance.
Designed and integrated AI-driven dashboards with **D3.js**, **Cytoscape.js**, and **Recharts**, facilitating real-time data visualization and decision-making.
Ensured code quality and deployment efficiency by leveraging **Docker** and **AWS** for containerization and hosting solutions.
Implemented **CI/CD** pipelines using **Jenkins** and **AWS CodePipeline**, streamlining the development cycle and achieving a **50%** reduction in deployment times.
Managed infrastructure provisioning with **Terraform**, optimizing resource deployment and configuration management across environments.

Developed user-centric applications utilizing **Next.js**, **React**, and **TypeScript** to enhance user experience and engagement by improving UI responsiveness by **35%**.
Designed and implemented efficient data visualizations using **D3.js**, **Cytoscape.js**, and **Recharts**, resulting in interactive graphs with a load time improvement of **50%**.
Collaborated within an agile team environment to elevate communication and streamline development processes through effective **teamwork**.
Architected and developed backend microservices using **Node.js** and **REST** principles, achieving a stable deployment rate of **99%** through **CI/CD** practices.
Leveraged **AWS** services and **Docker** for containerization and orchestration, delivering scalable solutions.
Utilized **Terraform** for infrastructure as code, enabling rapid deployment of environments and services for enhanced development workflow.
Integrated **AI-driven dashboards** for real-time analytics and insights, fostering data-driven decision-making.

skills:
